examples.name: Assignment
examples.src:
a = 3
b = "a string"
c = 3.1415
d = False
e = [1,False, 5.67, [5,6]]
println (a)
println (b)
println (c)
println (d)
println (e)

examples.name: For Loop
examples.src:
for i = 1 to 5 do
  println (i)
end

examples.name: While loop
examples.src:
i = 5
while i >= 1 do
   println (i)
   i = i - 1
end

examples.name: Repeat loop
examples.src:
i = 5
repeat
   println (i)
   i = i - 1
until i < 1

examples.name: Arithmetic
examples.src:
a = 3.4; b = 7.8
println (-a, " ", a/b, " ", a*b, " ")
println (a+b, " ", a-b, " ", a mod b, " ", 12 div 5)

examples.name: Math
examples.src:
import math
println ("Pi constant = ", math.pi)
println (math.sin (math.pi))

examples.name: User functions
examples.src:
function callme (a, b)
    c = a + b
    return c
end

println (callme (2,3))
println (callme ("Hello ", "World"))

examples.name: Lists
examples.src:
a = [1,2,3,4]
println (a)
b = [True, False]
c = a + b
println (c)
a = [1,True,3.14,"Rhodus",[5,6,[8,9]]]
x = a[2]
println (x)
println (a[4,2])
a[4,2] = ["abc"]
println (a)

examples.name: Arrays
examples.src:
a = array([1,2,3,4])
b = array([0]*20)

println (a.len())
println (b.len())
println (b)

examples.name: Square
examples.src:
import graphics

graphics.clear()
delta = 100
graphics.moveto(50,50)
graphics.lineto(50+delta,50)
graphics.lineto(50+delta,50+delta)
graphics.lineto(50,50+delta)
graphics.lineto(50,50)

examples.name: Tree
examples.src:
import graphics
import math

x = 260; y = 600
heading = 270

function forward (distance)
  global x, y

  graphics.moveto(x,y)
  radians = heading*math.pi/180
  dx = math.cos (radians) * distance
  dy = math.sin (radians) * distance
  x = x + dx
  y = y + dy
  graphics.lineto(x,y)
end

function tree(branchLen)
    global heading
    if branchLen > 5 then
       forward(branchLen)
       heading = heading + 20
       tree(branchLen-15)
       heading = heading - 40
       tree(branchLen-15)
       heading = heading + 20
       forward(-branchLen)
    end
end

graphics.clear()
graphics.pencolor(210,20,0)
graphics.moveto (x,y)
graphics.penwidth(2)
tree(115)

examples.name: Colors1
examples.src:
import graphics
import math
import random

graphics.clear()
for i = 1 to 4 do
    for j = 1 to 4 do
        r = random.randint(255)
        g = random.randint(255)
        b =  random.randint(255)
        graphics.pencolor (r, g, b); 
        graphics.brushcolor (r, g, b); 
        graphics.fillellipse (j*80,i*100,70,70)  
    end
end
